text:
Pre-Processor Counter doesn't accept user variables for Start, Maximum.
Only numbers are accepted for Start, Increment, Maximum.

That doesn't allow Counter values to be set from User Variables, properties.
creator: lubosp@msn.com
mstover1@apache.org
text:
Seems to work fin in 1.9RC3.  Maybe you accidentally selected the wrong version
of JMeter?

creator: lubosp@msn.com
text:
I am running JMeter 1.9RC3.
I create New Test Plan, add Thread Group, and Add Counter.
On Counter page (GUI) I set:
Start: ${start}
Maximum: ${end}

and then click on Thread Group again. When I click back on Counter to display
Counter page (GUI), Start is set to 0 not ${start}, Maximum is set to 0 not to
${end}.

If I set Start to 2, and End to 5 the values will stay when moving away of 
Counter page and then coming back.

Gotcha - thanks for the extra explanation and sorry I didn't understand the
first time.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
